Phébus-Clode: In-home survey including over 500 questions and energy bills.
Phébus-DPE: EPC audit realized among voluntary households that participated in the Clode survey
CEREN: Census data supplemented by household and retrofit contractor surveys.

Phébus-DPE: 2,389 dwellings (from the 5,405 of the Clode sample)
CEREN: 3,000 (2,000 in existing dwellings and 800 in new ones)

Phébus-Clode: Management : SoeS, Veritas pour DPE, Ipsos pour Clode. Funding : EDF, Total, Leclerc, ANAH, ADEME.
